channel.title: Help Vps Problem
channel.description:
[center]Hi Over 5 Days Il make my server 24/7 ( Vps Host)
But how to Register On a Vps Host And what i need to do get the vps host in my server And its hamachi now IS it going come non hamachi ??? [/center]

item.title: Help Vps Problem
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“abdelwassa, post:2, topic:311005”]hmm i never saw some one hosting vps on hamachi lol[/quote]He isn’t.

A VPS usually automatically has all ports open, all you do is follow the how to make a server tutorial and skip the portforwarding step

Read full topic
